item.title: Public talks and Publications
item.description: 01.June 2022 - Tech evening at Novanet - “Migration journey from VM-hosted SaaS solution to containers and Azure Kubernetes Service - experiences and considerations” In this session I talked about migration from VM-hosted SaaS solution to containers and Azure Kubernetes Service, how we did it in one of my projects and what considerations are important to take when planning such a migration journey.
